name: Manpower
description: Manpower, a global leader in employment for over 70 years, combines advanced HR tech with a personal touch. Spanning continents, we connect job seekers with employers, ensuring optimal matches. Understanding industries and individual goals, we fill roles, foster growth, and craft success stories. We effectively assess and develop skills, keeping our associates ahead of the curve, so they can get the jobs done each time, every time.
features: 14K Small to mid-sized organizations that we work with annually
83K Manpower Associates on assignment monthly on average
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
tags: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Elevate Careers, Amplify Businesses
ShortDescription: At Manpower, we're your bridge to growth and opportunity

Highlights.name: Find Work Fast
Highlights.description: Manpower receives daily job openings from various sectors like transportation, logistics, engineering, and finance.

Highlights.name: People First
Highlights.description: Advance your career with online training courses, e-learning programs and personalized career guidance.

Highlights.name: Diversity & Inclusion
Highlights.description: We empower underrepresented groups through skill-building programs for sustainable employment.

enhanced_description: Manpower, a global leader in employment with over 75 years of expertise, leverages advanced HR technology combined with a personal approach to connect job seekers with employers across continents. They specialize in optimal talent matches, skill assessment and development, offering comprehensive career guidance through online training courses and e-learning programs. Annually, Manpower partners with 14,000 small to mid-sized organizations and places an average of 83,000 associates on assignment monthly. The organization also champions diversity and inclusion by empowering underrepresented groups through dedicated skill-building programs for sustainable employment, serving key industries such as transportation, logistics, engineering, and finance.
key_use_cases: Hiring top talent faster and more efficiently
Connecting job seekers with employers for optimal matches
Skill assessment and development for workforce readiness
Providing online training and personalized career guidance
Supporting diversity and inclusion through skill-building programs
competitive_advantages: 75 years of workforce expertise and global leadership
Combines advanced HR technology with a personal touch for tailored solutions
High volume of talent placements (83,000+ associates monthly)
Dedicated programs for skill assessment and development
Strong focus on diversity and inclusion initiatives
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient talent acquisition
Optimal talent matches leading to better productivity
Fosters career growth for individuals and business growth for organizations
scalability_features: High volume talent placement capabilities (83,000+ assignments monthly)
Ability to serve a large number of organizations (14,000+ annually)
